channel.title: IFFresearch on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in IFFresearch on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Unpacking the positives and risks of Apple and Google’s contact tracing foray #SaveOurPrivacy
item.description: IFF’s Working Paper on Privacy Prescriptions for Technology Interventions on COVID-19 in India, affords significant space to the issue of contact tracing technologies. It offers a preliminary breakdown of the Apple and Google’s proposed partnership to provide a digital contact tracing solution.

item.title: 66A and other Legal Zombies: Government responds but the horror continues #IFFresearch #RightToMeme
item.description: IFF’s study on the continued use of Section 66A leads to a government response. But as fresh cases continue to be registered we press for more.
